title: How to find vintage books - Quora

response.answer_text: One day in early 2016, I was searching for anything cool in an antique store. They had a back room that was really messy and probably dangerous from all of the dust. I headed in and saw a box of books towards the back. They looked like they hadn’t been touched in 30 years. I only had 12 dollars on me, so I got 4 books. The oldest of them was from 1821, the newest from 1906. You can never know where you’ll find some vintage books, so you have to just start looking. Good luck.

I get all my vintage books from here Best Vintage Classic Books Store Online | Country House Library. Massive selection of books and they even have a fantastic blog which gives some great suggestions. They post worldwide as well which is great as we tend to move around a bit.
